name: .NET Developer
description:
Focus 21 is working as a development service provider for different kinds of American based companies . We are searching for the certain specialists who can drive the work within our multicultural team. Most of the work will be conducted remotely, there will be no need to spend your time visiting the office.

We are looking for someone who is ready going to have fun writing software within our team! Now we are up to open the whole domain of .NET development for our company.

Responsibilities:
Software Engineer will develop software across the technology stack, including back-end development, web development.

Your specific responsibilities will include:

  • Working on product implementations and interacting directly with clients
  • Conducting regular code deployments across multiple environments
  • Helping to develop and deploy predictive machine learning models and computer vision applications
  • Data manipulation and orchestration
  • Integrating external data sources and best-in-class 3rd-party technologies

You’ll be a great fit if you have:

  • 3+ years of professional work experience in software engineering
  • Knowledge of .NET frameworks and tools
  • Strong verbal and written English language
  • Exceptional ability to organize work and excellent follow-through

Will be a plus:

  • Knowledge SQL and other leading full stack web development frameworks and tools
  • Highly interested in a fast-paced software development environment
  • Passion for learning new things and continuous improvement

working_time_intervals.name: Можно работать сменами по 4–6 часов в день
